name: ZSH for Dev Containers
description: A feature that installs ZSH with Oh My ZSH, command history, plugins, and themes.

omzPluginCloneList.description: Space separated list of Oh-My-ZSH custom plugin Git URLs that will be cloned

zshPluginList.description: Space separated list of ZSH plugin names that will be installed

configureCommandHistory.description: Whether to configure ZSH to use the command history feature

restoreZshConfig.description: Whether to overwrite the ZSH configuration file with the default OMZ configuration

installSpaceshipTheme.description: Whether to install the Spaceship theme

username.description: The username to install ZSH for, by default uses 'remoteUser' or 'containerUser' from config
